title: Express Talk: New on View in Contemporary Art
hero_caption: <p>Cauleen Smith. <em>Conduct Your Blooming</em>, 2016. Ann M. Vielehr Prize Fund, The Neil G. Bluhm Contemporary Art Matching Fund Initiative, Mr. and Mrs. Frank  …
description:
New on View is a monthly series that highlights an artwork or exhibition that is new to our galleries. This month, join museum educator Paulina Lopez to learn about recently acquired works in the contemporary galleries.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
